777080.name: Depraved - Soundtrack + Name In Game
777080.description:
Soundtrack

This DLC contains the soundtrack of Depraved. 11 songs in MP3 format. After downloading you will find the soundtrack in the Steam folder of Depraved (% steam%\steamapps\common\Depraved\Soundtrack).


Tracklist:
Death Is Coming (02:24)
Free Wilderness (01:21)
Good Life (01:51)
Hard Work (01:17)
Intro Wild West (02:21)
Nothing Is Lost (02:08)
Old Man (01:00)
Run Or Die (02:24)
The Right Way (02:26)
Wild Nature(01:53)
Wrong Way (02:00)

Name In Game

This DLC also gives you the opportunity to enter your name into the game. It then shows up in all players games.

To enter a name, use the "Visit the website" Link
